project_description: Development of an online system enabling customers to schedule, reschedule, and cancel appointments via web and mobile platforms, aiming to improve customer convenience, reduce manual errors, and optimize resource utilization.
objectives: Enhance customer experience by enabling 24/7 online booking
Reduce administrative workload of staff managing appointments
Provide automated reminders to reduce no-shows
Enable reporting and analytics for better business insights
scope: In Scope: Web and mobile access for booking appointments
In Scope: User registration and login
In Scope: Appointment scheduling, rescheduling, and cancellation
In Scope: Admin dashboard for staff to view/manage bookings
Out of Scope: Payment integration (planned for future phase)
Out of Scope: Third-party CRM integration
key_features: Search and book available appointment slots
Admin management of bookings (view, edit, cancel)
technical_requirements: Accessible via desktop and mobile browsers
timeline_estimate: Requirements Gathering: 2 weeks; Design & Development: 8 weeks; Testing: 3 weeks; Deployment: 1 week
risks: Limited budget restricts phase 1 to core booking features only
assumptions: System will be hosted on a cloud-based environment
